footer.el: Τροφοδοτείται με περηφάνια από το GlobaLeaks, τα πνευματικά δικαιώματα ανήκουν στο Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.en: proudly powered by GlobaLeaks, copyright by Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.vi: proudly powered by GlobaLeaks, copyright by Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.ca: orgullosament impulsat per GlobaLeaks, copyright Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.it: fieri di basarci su GlobaLeaks, copyright dell'Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.sr_RS: proudly powered by GlobaLeaks, copyright by Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.ar: مدعومة بفخر من GlobaLeaks. الحقوق الفكرية محفوظة ل "مركز هيرميس للشفافية و حقوق الإنسان الإليكترونية".
footer.cs: proudly powered by GlobaLeaks, copyright by Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.es: orgullosamente impulsado por GlobaLeaks, copyright Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.ru: proudly powered by GlobaLeaks, copyright by Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.nl: trots aangedreven door GlobaLeaks, copyright bij Hermes Centrum voor Transparantie en Digital mensenrechten
footer.tr: GlobaLeaks tarafından gururla sağlanmaktadır ve Kamuyu Aydınlatma ve Sayısal İnsan Hakları için Hermes Merkezi tarafından telif hakkı altındadır
footer.sr_RS@latin: proudly powered by GlobaLeaks, copyright by Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.hu_HU: a GlobaLeaks büszkén mutatja be, a szerzői jog tulajdonosa a Hermes Központ az Átláthatóságért és a Digitális Emberi Jogokért
footer.hr_HR: ponosno pokreće GlobaLeaks, autorska prava Hermes centra za transparentnost i digitalna ljudska prava
footer.pt_PT: proudly powered by GlobaLeaks, copyright by Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.pl: z dumą prowadzony przez GlobaLeaks, prawa autorskie Hermes Center for Transparency oraz Digital Human Rights
footer.fr: fièrement motorisé par GlobaLeaks, copyright par Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights (Centre Hermès pour la Transparence et les Droits Numériques de l'homme)
footer.bg: proudly powered by GlobaLeaks, copyright by Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.th: นำเสนอด้วยความภาคภูมิใจโดยโกลบอลลีคส์ ลิขสิทธิ์ของเฮอร์เมส เซ็นเตอร์เพื่อความโปร่งใสและสิทธิมนุษยชนแบบดิจิตัล
footer.pt_BR: orgulhosamente desenvolvido na GlobaLeaks, com direitos autorais pelo Hermes Center por Digital Transparência e Direitos Humanos
footer.de: proudly powered by GlobaLeaks, copyright by Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.sv: är stolt baserat på GlobaLeaks, upphovsrätt innehavs av Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.sk: s hrdosťou beží na GlobaLeaks, copyright by Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.lv: darbojas, izmantojot GlobaLeaks, autortiesības pieder Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights
footer.nb_NO: stolt drevet av GlobaLeaks, kopirett Hermes Center for Transparency and Digital Human Rights  / Hermes senter for etterettlighet og digitale menneskerettigheter

zip_description.en:
The following files may contain sensitive information, for the Whistleblower
and for the involved person and organization.

Please, do never disclose these files until an appropriate analysis and 
redaction.

Files number: %FilesNumber%
Total uncompressed size: %TotalSize%

File details and integrity checksum:

%FileList%

Take Care,
%NodeName%, a GlobaLeaks node

encrypted_file_template.en:
Esteemed %ReceiverName%,

This is an E-Mail message to notify you that a Whistleblower
has updated a submission with new material.

The Tip can be reached via Tor at: %TipTorURL%
This has happened in %ContextName% at %EventTime%.

Take Care,
%NodeName%, a GlobaLeaks node

plaintext_tip_template.en:
Esteemed %ReceiverName%,

This is an E-Mail message to notify you that someone has selected you as a valuable recipient
of WhistleBlowing material in the form of a Globaleaks tip-off. This message has been created
by the GlobaLeaks Node %NodeName%, in "%ContextName%".

This tip-off has been sent to you by an anonymous whistleblower. She/He would like you
to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please consider
that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in order to protect the
public good. Therefore the material that they provide with this tip-off should be considered
of high importance.

You can download the material from the following URLs:

via Tor:
%TipTorURL%
or:
%TipT2WURL%

Submission date: %EventTime%

Please do not forward or share this e-mail: each tip-off has a limited number of downloads and
access before being destroyed forever, nobody (even the node administrator) can recover and
expired or dead tip-off.

Take Care,
%NodeName%, a GlobaLeaks node

encrypted_message_template.en:
Esteemed %ReceiverName%,

This is an E-Mail message to notify you about a new Message
from the Whisleblower, in %EventTime%.

The message is related to the Tip: %TipTorURL% 

Take Care,
%NodeName%, a GlobaLeaks node

plaintext_comment_template.en:
Esteemed %ReceiverName%,

This is an E-Mail message to notify you that %CommentSource%
has added a comment to a previously notified Tip (%TipTorURL%) in %EventTime%

This has happened in %ContextName% at %EventTime%.

Take Care,
%NodeName%, a GlobaLeaks node

encrypted_tip_template.en:
Esteemed %ReceiverName%,

This is an E-Mail message to notify you that someone has selected you as a valuable recipient
of WhistleBlowing material in the form of a Globaleaks tip-off. This message has been created
by the GlobaLeaks Node %NodeName%, in "%ContextName%".

This tip-off has been sent to you by an anonymous whistleblower. She/He would like you
to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please consider
that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in order to protect the
public good. Therefore the material that they provide with this tip-off should be considered
of high importance.

You can download the material from the following URLs:

via Tor:
%TipTorURL%
or:
%TipT2WURL%

Submission date: %EventTime%

Please do not forward or share this e-mail: each tip-off has a limited number of downloads and
access before being destroyed forever, nobody (even the node administrator) can recover and
expired or dead tip-off.

Take Care,
%NodeName%, a GlobaLeaks node

plaintext_file_template.en:
Esteemed %ReceiverName%,

This is an E-Mail message to notify you that a Whistleblower
has updated a submission with new material.

The Tip can be reached via Tor at: %TipTorURL%
This has happened in %ContextName% at %EventTime%.

Take Care,

Esteemed %ReceiverName%,

This is an E-Mail message to notify you about
a new Message from the Whisleblower in %EventTime%.

The message is related to the Tip: %TipTorURL%

Take Care,

encrypted_comment_template.en:
Esteemed %ReceiverName%,

This is an E-Mail message to notify you that %CommentSource%
has added a comment to a previously notified Tip (%TipTorURL%) in %EventTime%.

This has happened in %ContextName% at %EventTime%.

Take Care,
%NodeName%, a GlobaLeaks node

ping_mail_template.en:
Dear %ReceiverName%,

There are %EventCount% good reason to connect exactly where you know!

admin_pgp_alert_mail_template.en:
Dear Globaleaks Node Administrator,

This is an e-mail to inform you that the PGP key of the following users is going to expire or is already expired:

%PGPKeyInfoList%

Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send them encrypted notifications.

Kind regards,
%NodeSignature%
', u'ca': u'Dear Globaleaks Node Administrator,

This is an e-mail to inform you that the PGP key of the following users is going to expire or is already expired:

%PGPKeyInfoList%

Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send them encrypted notifications.

Kind regards,
%NodeSignature%

pgp_alert_mail_template.en:
Dear %ReceiverName%,

This is an e-mail to inform you that your PGP key is expiring or already expired.

%PGPKeyInfo%

Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send you encrypted notifications.

You should extend its validity and update the key present on the GlobaLeaks nodes you are subscribed to or upload a new key.

Kind regards,
%NodeSignature%
